com.example.unlibrary.library

Class LibraryViewModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • com.example.unlibrary.library.LibraryViewModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooksSource, BarcodeScanner.OnFinishedScanListener

    public class LibraryViewModel
extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
implements BarcodeScanner.OnFinishedScanListener, BooksSource
    Manages the Library flow business logic. Connects the library fragments to the repository.

      • selectRequester

        public void selectRequester(android.view.View v,
                            int position)
        Used in the onClick method for selecting a requester from recycler view of requesters in detailed book view. Sets mSelectedRequester to the right user and navigates to a fragment with their profile.

      • initMapsFragment

        public void initMapsFragment()
        onClick method for the accept request button in the requester's profile fragment. Navigated to the map fragment

      • declineSelectedRequester

        public void declineSelectedRequester()
        Used as the onClick method for the decline button in the requester's profile fragment. Calls a method in the library repository to make required changes in the database by passing in the required information about the currently selected book and requester, and lambdas to be used in onSuccess/onFailure listeners.

      • acceptSelectedRequester

        public void acceptSelectedRequester(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng,
                                    SendNotificationInterface notification)
        Accepts the selected requester and sets the handoff location
        Parameters:
        latLng - location for handoff given by its latitude longitude coordinates
        notification - lamda to send notification about accepted request

      • updateHandoffLocation

        public void updateHandoffLocation(com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng latLng)
        Updates the handoff location for the current book
        Parameters:
        latLng - location for handoff given by its latitude longitude coordinate
